HomePage.title: Server-Side Rendering Demo
HomePage.description: The following data is fetched and rendered on the server, demonstrating Next.js SSR functionality
HomePage.pageUpdated: Page updated to use Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
HomePage.dataRendered: Data is fetched and rendered on the server

instructions.title: Testing Instructions:
instructions.clickSame: Click the same button multiple times quickly to test caching
instructions.compareTimestamps: Compare timestamps and requestId to see if responses are cached
instructions.waitRevalidation: Wait for revalidation time to pass, then test again
instructions.checkNetwork: Check the browser Network tab to see actual HTTP requests
instructions.noCache: No Cache should always make new requests
instructions.isr: ISR endpoints should cache responses for the specified duration

guide.title: Middleware Testing Guide:
guide.headers: Headers: Check for X-Middleware-* headers added by middleware
guide.timing: Timing: X-Middleware-Processing-Time shows middleware execution time
guide.apiRoutes: API Routes: Should have X-API-Request and X-Cache-Test headers
guide.rewrite: Rewrite: /test-rewrite should show /test-cache content but keep URL
guide.cacheRoutes: Cache Routes: Should have X-Cache-Testing-Route header
guide.console: Console: Check browser console for middleware logs
